text: Vogrie Country Park in Scotland is managed by Midlothian Council. It consists of a woodland estate surrounding the Victorian Vogrie House. It is located around from Edinburgh between Pathhead and Gorebridge. Facilities in the parkland include a miniature railway, 9-hole golf course, children's play area and four miles of walks. The River Tyne flows through the park. ==External links== *Vogrie Country Park - Midlothian Council Category:Country parks in Scotland Category:Parks in Midlothian
title: Vogrie Country Park
